steps: step 2: Click on link mobileBrand (iPhone15Plus) -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
step 4: Click on label yellow -> Navigate to page '/cart'
step 5: Click on button Increased -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
step 8: Enter input value in input Email
step 9: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
step 13: Enter input value in input FirstName
step 16: Enter input value in input Address
step 19: Enter input value in input LastName
step 23: Enter input value in input ZipCode
step 25: Enter input value in input State
step 28: Enter input value in input ShippingCity
step 30: Enter input value in input Phone
step 31: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
step 32: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
step 33: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
